title: alastantiger
author: alastantiger
content: I find myself pretty bothered by everything going on in the world. Have you ever noticed how it's so hard to come across positive news about the economy, whether it's in our own country or globally? It's genuinely disheartening. Every time we read, watch, or discuss something related to the economy, it's all about inflation, recession, debt, bankruptcy, companies downsizing, laying off hundreds of workers, shareholders firing CEOs, and the company's stock taking a nosedive. Can't we just catch a break and have some good economic news for once?

comments.author: EFS
comments.body: It's hard to see good news in general. There may be good news on the economy on a micro scale, but not so much on a macro level. Fortunately, we have an outlet like Bitcoin to protect our own finances. Governments mismanagement, wars around the world, pandemics, earthquakes, all have a bad impact on the economy. Without confidence, companies hesitate to make new investments. Unemployment and inflation rise. In such a world, it's pretty normal not to get good news.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: true especially in my country we are always promised better economy but year after year it seems like it’s just getting worse prices are getting high yet salary is still low it’s been quite some time now since businesses have opened and normal life have returned after the pandemic but we can not deny the effects it has caused everyone i see other people recovering already while some still hasn’t aside from the pandemic there has been political issues all around the world that also affect the economy such as wars and the threat for world war iii has been introduced many times before affecting the flow of products in countries it’s quite devastating to live in a time where money is so needed yet so hard to obtain the economy crisis might not be solved globally but for the mean time i am hoping that my investments in cryptocurrency pays off

comments.body: It’s because negative news generates more visitors than positive news. People want to hear the negative about bitcoin or some stock. If it’s positive news, most people won’t want to read it. I heard it’s a psychological thing.Recently however most of bitcoin news was positive however, especially with the way the etf process is going. Same with ETH and how they are planning a spot etf for Ethereum also.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: It depends on which news site you subscribe to. Journalists are more interested in making news that gets the most attention from the public. And aided by your browser cookie settings, everything seems to dictate you to only consume negative news.

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: There is not much we can do in the midst of an economic cycle that continues to decline. Apart from trying to save yourself and your family in order to survive. For the lower middle class there are no perfect economic conditions. The crisis, the onslaught of the online market, imported goods which are increasingly being adopted by the public, have resulted in the neglect of locally produced goods which should be preserved and developed to increase the country's economic income, but are instead denied access.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: It sounds a bit heavy, I think we encounter positive things every day. For example, I just bought fruit and received a full refund. It may seem like things are going on that are bringing stress to the economy, but instead of dwelling on the negative atmosphere, choose to look at things with positive eyes. Perhaps partly due to people choosing a quiet life, I feel that even though it's sad that many people are having difficulty in the current social context, it would be better for them that we each individually pay attention. Likes to do positive things to share with those around me.I often remind my friends that the news we encounter every day is very important, it unintentionally directly affects our emotions of the day. So to easily read news anywhere, you need to be proactive first, choose new and useful things other than information about the main field that people are doing to diversify their lives.

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: Negative information catches more attention and is what usually becomes the news, which creates a false perception that everything is so bad. That's one side of it. Another side is that seeing negative opinions means living in a free country, or at least somewhat free. If you're in North Korea, I'm sure everything in the news is extremely positive, there are no problems within the country. Because, you know, you can get killed for saying otherwise.And yes, I have seen somewhat positive prognosis. While the global outcast is that the economy will weaken in comparison with 2023, in my country, the inflation is expected to decrease, which is a relatively good thing.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: There are good economic news, but the reality for ordinary people is that we stay in the same shit... Stock market gains, GDP growth, big companies are making more profit than ever, but that doesn't reflect on most of us, the cost of living is higher than ever before and it's hard to keep up with that with "old salaries". My/our wages are not rising as fast as prices are rising, and that's why we don't feel the good economic news. The inequality between the poor and the rich is increasing, just look at the number of billionaires and how their wealth is bigger every year, while the number of poor people is rising. That's not good, and I am not sure is there a way to reverse that.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.created_time: November 19, 2023, 09:09:11 AMLast edit: November 19, 2023, 09:44:08 AM by Majestic-milf
comments.body: Although it's quite difficult to get good news about the economy these days, I won't say it's being a while I heard me a good news. Take the price of Bitcoin going up for instance. Although in my country, I've gotten used to how bad the economy is suffering that I don't usually listen in on the news since I know it's going to be a repeat of what I know or something worse, so I rather do something else with my time. Most countries are being plagued by inflation and news outlets just seem to exacerbate the situation. For me, I won't say they are the cause since they're just doing their jobs. With how the world is shaping up, it will be hard to get good news, and not just about the economy alone.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: The "good" news rarely makes it across the table. You see, news media know that bad negative news about the world sells like hot cakes, its just how the human mind works. Keep yourself balanced with the positives and you will find new vigor to live and create something new, but that does not happen.Economics when doing well, do not make the news. It is only when they do bad. It does not mean that bitcoin will be the solution to all these problems and that media will take Bitcoin as a good omen either.Better to avoid reading the news altogether or develop your own immunity to the news that you read, take what you need and forget the rest.

Can't we just catch a break and have some good economic news for once?It might sound strange to you, but ask yourself, does it make sense to burden yourself with things that you have absolutely no influence on - and some of these things don't really affect you personally?I understand that it's hard to stand aside and pretend that nothing bad is happening, but the first step towards feeling better is to simply stop looking for bad news and try to create some good news yourself at your local level.
